linkedinProfileUrl.title: LinkedIn Profile URL
linkedinProfileUrl.description: URL of the LinkedIn profile to scrape, e.g., https://www.linkedin.com/in/username/

email.title: LinkedIn Email
email.description: Your LinkedIn login email. Kept secure.

password.title: LinkedIn Password
password.description: Your LinkedIn login password. Kept secure.

proxyConfiguration.title: Proxy Configuration
proxyConfiguration.description: Select proxy type. RESIDENTIAL proxies are recommended for LinkedIn. The actor will test this configuration and fall back if it fails.

maxPosts.title: Maximum Posts to Scrape
maxPosts.description: Maximum number of posts to scrape. Leave empty for all posts (may take a long time).

debugLog.title: Enable Debug Log
debugLog.description: Enable detailed debug logging in the actor log.
